movie_title: Myanmar mourns earthquake dead: BBC Learning English from the News
introduction: Myanmar is in mourning after an earthquake killed at least 2,700 people. üîé For a free worksheet, an

vocabulary.definition: the expression of deep sorrow for someone who has died
vocabulary.example: The country observed a day of mourning for the victims of the earthquake.

vocabulary.definition: save (someone) from a dangerous or difficult situation
vocabulary.example: The rescue team worked tirelessly to save the trapped survivors.

vocabulary.definition: the effect or influence of one thing on another
vocabulary.example: The earthquake had a devastating impact on the infrastructure of the city.

vocabulary.definition: to become or make something stronger or more extreme
vocabulary.example: The efforts to provide aid intensified as the situation became more critical.

vocabulary.definition: existing or happening over a large area
vocabulary.example: The earthquake caused widespread destruction across several regions.

vocabulary.definition: difficult in a way that is usually interesting or enjoyable
vocabulary.example: The rescue operation proved to be challenging due to the unstable rubble.
